ALTAIR WOMEN IN TECHNOLOGY (W iT)
Altair Women in Technology develops and empowers women at Altair, and amplifies their  
unique perspectives, ideas, and experiences to establish a more diverse, more inclusive workplace. 
We’re committed to attracting top talent and ensuring each and every woman at Altair can  
reach her full potential.No industry or organization 
can reach its full potential until women reach their full potential. This is especially true at Altair, where women with a surplus of talent are provided with the opportunities, training, and mentoring, as well as ongoing support to realize their true potential.” 
Preeta Bahugune, Director of Human 
Resources, APACWOMEN IN TECH
